WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
I'am new on C# and I try to do extract data from a HTML file
 
I found Html Agility Pack library and it seems to be the solution to do this ;)
 
I have only one problem to extract text when the node have many texts
 
the Html Agility Pack tester give xpath = /html[1]/body[1]/#text[4] to have the 4th text of the first body, but it doesn't work (exception)
 
could you tell me the right synthax to have text node ?
 
Thank you
Eric
